thread.title: Warriors humbled by Blazers in 2nd exhibition
thread.title_full: Warriors humbled by Blazers in 2nd exhibition - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Rusty Simmons
title: Warriors humbled by Blazers in 2nd exhibition
text:
Photo: STEVE DYKES, AP Golden State Warriors guard Stephen Curry (30) is fouled by Portland Trail Blazers guard C.J. McCollum (3) during the first quarter of an NBA preseason basketball game in Portland, Ore., Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. Golden State Warriors guard Stephen Curry (30) is fouled by...
PORTLAND, Ore. — Midway through Thursday night’s third quarter, Stephen Curry stopped by press row to jokingly remind the media that he had committed only one personal foul. Golden State Warriors guard Stephen Curry (30) is fouled by Portland Trail Blazers guard C.J. McCollum (3) during the first quarter of an NBA preseason basketball game in Portland, Ore., Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. Golden State Warriors guard Stephen Curry (30) is fouled by...
PORTLAND, Ore. — Midway through Thursday night’s third quarter, Stephen Curry stopped by press row to jokingly remind the media that he had committed only one personal foul.
